review: Easy to use and have enjoyed all of the movies and music I can get for free with Prime membership. Was surprised that CDs I had purchased in the past off of Amazon were already loaded on my account. Seriously considering buying another for use on other TV's or for travel. Where I placed this one, it is not easy to get to in order to move around. LOVE IT.

review: We like the way it works with one major disappointment on the commercial there is no illusions of the fact it has to be plugged in it simply looks like it is just the stick in your TV that limits where you can use it and that was very disappointing
author: Becky Byrd

review: The Fire TV Stick is junk. Same problem as many others; the connection drops constantly. We haven't been able to watch a single movie. The router is a foot away from the stick. Tried another HDMI port, rebooting, even went back to factory defaults and set it up again.  The WIFI TV and the WIFI DVD player stream perfectly and never lose a connection. I love shopping at amazon but I don't plan to buy any more of their electronics.

review: So easy to use. But you must have a power outlet or extension cord within 2 feet. It's the same as a Playstation except no DVD. Great piece of electronic s.
